snippet.title: Legends of Tzonac 2: Friendship & Automata OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
I'm participating in the Crunchless Challenge (make a game with intent to sell over the course of a month without crunching), and part of it is marketing the game.  So I'm posting the trailer a bit earlier than I usually do.  Also putting the game's page up, so that people can start adding it to collections (and I'll post weekly updates until the release...so two updates, but still...).

FIND THE GAME ON ITCH.IO: https://sciaenops.itch.io/legends-of-tzonac-2-friendship-automata
CRUNCHLESS CHALLENGE: https://itch.io/jam/crunchless-challenge
